scan_linter_check.description: The DevTools provided class InstallerAPI is used to perform one-time changes on an instance after the installation of a scoped app. The InstallerAPI class accepts a parameter which is used to make sure that installation scripts are not executed twice during an installation - and it helps to improve logging output.
scan_linter_check.name: CodeSanity - InstallerAPI without context
scan_linter_check.short_description: When initializing the InstallerAPI class, supply a context string
